item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Niantic announces “Large Geospatial Model” trained on Pokémon Go player data (273 points | 232 comments)
2. Show HN: We open-sourced our compost monitoring tech (45 points | 13 comments)
3. What is the origin of the lake tank image that has become a meme? (2021) (515 points | 112 comments)
4. Building Databases over a Weekend (52 points | 7 comments)
5. Electrobun: Cross-platform desktop applications written in TypeScript (73 points | 19 comments)
6. Everyone is capable of, and can benefit from, mathematical thinking (31 points | 11 comments)
7. Weight-loss drug found to shrink heart muscle in mice, human cells (178 points | 199 comments)
8. Z-Library Helps Students to Overcome Academic Poverty, Study Finds (204 points | 46 comments)
9. AAA – Analytical Anti-Aliasing (483 points | 73 comments)
10. AlphaQubit: AI to identify errors in Quantum Computers (99 points | 41 comments)
11. Doxx/Darkflare: DarkFlare TCPoCDN (TCP over CDN) (49 points | 9 comments)
12. Undergraduates with family income below $200k will be tuition-free at MIT (433 points | 313 comments)
13. Show HN: Autotab – Programmable AI browser for turning web tasks into APIs (78 points | 38 comments)
14. Vapi (YC W21) Is Hiring Founding Senior Engineer (Front End) ( | hide)
15. SQL, Homomorphisms and Constraint Satisfaction Problems (122 points | 11 comments)
16. New Calculation Finds we are close to the Kessler Syndrome [video] (67 points | 64 comments)
17. January 1928: Dirac equation unifies quantum mechanics and special relativity (7 points | 2 comments)
18. How good are American roads? (175 points | 382 comments)
19. Bit-twiddling optimizations in Zed's Rope (98 points | 35 comments)
20. Fashion History Timeline (12 points | 1 comment)
21. Does the Internet Route Around Damage? – Baltic Sea Cable Cuts (54 points | 11 comments)
22. Why everyone missed solar's exponential growth (9 points | 3 comments)
23. Google stops letting sites like Forbes rule search for "Best CBD Gummies" (195 points | 128 comments)
24. The Problem of Thinking Too Much (2002) (7 points | 3 comments)
25. Gregglogger (13 points | 4 comments)
26. Pipe Viewer – A Unix Utility You Should Know About (130 points | 26 comments)
27. Apple fights to keep DOJ antitrust suit from reaching trial (60 points | 35 comments)
28. Between the Booms: AI in Winter – Communications of the ACM (58 points | 38 comments)
29. Exploring the Cost and Feasibility of Battery-Electric Ships (28 points | 59 comments)
30. Show HN: Cardo ‒ Open Source desktop podcast client (80 points | 28 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
